Hi Enzob,

This question is best answered by Djordje Spasic who has added the ability to calculate PET with the Ladybug_Thermal Comfort Indices component.  Until he responds here, you can see that he posted some PET papers that he used to make the component on this discussion:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/217](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/217)

If you know python, you can also see his code for calculating PET here:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/ladybug...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/ladybug_ladybug.py#L4817-L5173)

Hope this helps,

-Chris
